column4: hello, i've got a huge problem, yesterday i installed opensuse in another partition of my disk deleteng debian... today when i try to boot into ubuntu, it doesn't find the kernel. i'm using a live cd. i already checked, and the kernel is there. what can i do?
you may need to reconfigure grub.
